Text: Wow! Pretty quick to get here. Thanks!
1.2.1 came out. Release a patch please.

1.2 - The archers won't fire from walls/towers, disappointment -.- 

I will pay for the game when it's "more playable" for now i wait and see where the game is heading with the updates. I did my mistake to buy Minecraft in the early stages. It was great with survival-skills, i hopped factors like "thirst", "overheat", "sickness" medical plants etc. was going to come but NO!!! Let's make an Oblivion copy instead with scrolls, magic and enchantments... -.- Then i stopped play the game...
